title: Suggestion: Combine the filter field with the connect field
author: Glober777
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

Is it possible to combine the Connect field on the tool bar with the Search field capability, so that when you type something there on the top field, it would filter-out connections in the list accordingly?

## Expected Behavior
A user types in the name of the server in the filed on the tool bar (Could be renamed to 'Search\Connect' or something more human-readable). As the user types in the name the list of connections fi...

comments.snippet:
The "*connect field on top*", how you call it, is the quick connect toolbar and it's only for quick connections. Intertwining the quick connect toolbar with the connections tree search field is not a good idea, since these are two completely separate features.

***

> Connect field is on top and always visible

Simply not true. You can decide if it's shown or hidden.
